thread.section_title: Novotel London West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent service, personal, professional, highly recommended
thread.title_full: Excellent service, personal, professional, highly recommended - Review of Novotel London West, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: AEhoff
title: Excellent service, personal, professional, highly recommended
text:
For a large group, this hotel treats you like a small boutique hotel would.
I stay there regularly and the team from the reception staff, to restaurant, and room service, could not be more professional and accommodating
